location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Mountstuart Elphinstone, Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter records the endorsement by Riach of a set of bills of exchange drawn by Henry Willock, Charg√© d'Affaires, relating to the service of a named person who had participated in His Majesty's mission to Persia.
